ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 129
ygData.msgSnippet: Make that three.  although I have a sig, it is by no means large, it is only 1 line. ... The secret of life is to remember that you don t get your money back.
ygData.messageBody:
Make that three. although I have a sig, it is by no means large, it is
only 1 line.


At 02:33 PM 9/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "The weather is here, wish you were beautiful" <douglas@...>
>
>On Mon, 13 Sep 1999, dlobdell wrote:
>
>> Well that is my automatic signature, and in no way do I intend on
>> removing it for YOU, since you have been the only person to point it
>> out.
>
>Make it two people who have complained. Basic etiquette has asked for
>many years that sig files be kept to four lines or less of 80 characters
>or less.
>--
>"I would not mind you in my head," Lews Therin said, sounding almost
>sane, "if you were not so clearly mad."
>
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>Celebrate the NEW ONElist!
>Enter to win a trip to Hawaii! Go to:
><a href=" http://clickme.onelist.com/ad/hawaii2 ">Click Here</a>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Get paid to surf the web! Free!
>http://www.alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=bvf753
>

The secret of life is to remember that you don't get your money back.
